Text: I keep getting a broken link message for this torrent.  Anyone else having that problem?  (ps - thanks for the upload!)
Never mind.  I got it to work with the magnet.

Another awesome CD shared by 80zforever. It showcases a great band, like so many others from this period that should have been big. Thanx again for all the music the last while. My only disappointment is not having enough time to listen to everything right away!!!!
